name: Hypnic (DevelUP)
description:
Hypnic [n.] - the feeling of falling as you sleep

In this short story-driven platformer, enter the room of grief - witness, explore, and escape the pitfall of emotions.

DIRECTIONS

Use WASD to maneuver yourself

Hit [Space] to jump

Hold [R Shift] to slow time and aim

CREDITS

(good soup)^2

Russ Untivero - Artist

Dara Mendez - Artist

Cess R (thyprincess) - Writer, Composer

ctath Arroyo - Programmer, Composer

Jayson Tan - Programmer

Made for DevelUP's February 2022 5-day Internal Game Jam.
